price: 68. Sidee baadna ugu samir yeelan waxaadan cilmi ku koobin?
arabic: وَكَيۡفَ تَصۡبِرُ عَلَىٰ مَا لَمۡ تُحِطۡ بِهِۦ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wakayfa taṣbiru ʿalā mā lam tuḥiṭ bihi khub'ran
